channel.title: [Delta] Dragon Claw Special Glitch [Delta]
channel.description:
Hey Mopar I have a problem with my dragon claw special attack. I just used a tutorial to add it to my delta server. It works perfect on another player, but hits three 0's and one number on most npc's the one npc I know it does work is is KBD, as you can see with the screenshots below. Could someoen help me fix this please? I plan to release my server soon. Repping any help
Player: www.prntscr.com/ixmuv KBD: www.prntscr.com/ixmdl (Does Hit 4 Times Occasionally) Most Other NPC's www.prntscr.com/ixm6z
Regards -Xevi

item.title: [Delta] Dragon Claw Special Glitch [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i’m not sure. ask the big geeks in pm.
Big Geeks: Loveandpower, tyb97, frell, RandQm, Tehdevteam, Loads More…
Ask them. I’m just a normal guy going around and helping people with useless answers

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Dragon Claw Special Glitch [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Xevi Xevi
item.description:
@Xevi wrote:

After testing it a bit more, I think it’s the defence thing. Where can I change an npc’s defence? npc.cfg Only lets me change: respawn time, combat, and health

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Dragon Claw Special Glitch [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

either low strength or your npc have too much defence (if you get what i mean)

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Dragon Claw Special Glitch [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

maybe some over your npcs are over powered compared to your dragon claws my claws spec (using delta) works great for me
